product_name: Wilderness Press The Trinity Alps and Vicinity - 5th Edition
long_description: The updated edition of The Trinity Alps and Vicinity reveals some of the finest backcountry destinations in the area and includes Whiskeytown, the Russian Wilderness and the Castle Crags area.
short_description: The updated edition of The Trinity Alps and Vicinity reveals some of the finest backcountry destinations in the area and includes Whiskeytown, the Russian Wilderness and the Castle Crags area.
